name: Dream Catcher (itch) (timmmmmb)
description:
Instructions:

You play as a dreamcatcher. Your Objective is to filter out all the bad dreams. You rotate around the bed of your master by using your mouse or controller. Catch Grey, Yellow and Green Nightmares and let the pink love dreams through.

Creadits:

Michael "Cravay" Schertenleib: Code
Tim "timmmmmb" Frey: Art xD
Music:
